Window.CLOSING_ERROR: Save failed because the save data or settings file may have been deleted due to some reason.

CONTENT.CONTENT_CLOSE_WARNING: Cancelled. Data will not be saved if you continue. Are you sure?
CONTENT.CONTENT_FIRST:
Calculation is based on the forgetting curve from the initial time. You can stop the timer at any time after starting.
However, if you close CONTENT, it will be recorded as the initial time.
This dialog will only be shown once and will not appear again.
CONTENT.running_delete: The timer is running. You cannot stop it.

Setting.Set_BeforeDays: How many days back should the registered data be displayed?

export.exist_file: The file already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?

loading.file_warning:
Settings file not found. It will be created. Is that okay?
The file will be saved to the following location.
The Forwoth folder will include save files and other data.
If you cancel here, no data will be saved.
loading.unexpected_error: An unexpected error may have occurred while creating the file.
